context: Zillow exited iBuying (Zillow Offers) and refocused on its core media and mortgage businesses. The housing transaction platform vision continues with rentals, mortgages, and agent services.

competitors.name: Realtor.com
competitors.notes: News Corp-owned portal with MLS data

competitors.name: CoStar/Homes.com
competitors.notes: Aggressively expanding into residential real estate

competitors.name: Rocket Mortgage
competitors.notes: Mortgage competitor to Zillow Home Loans
